document.docAuthor: Cheng, Zhi-Fei, Li, Li-Zhen & Peng, Zhong
document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from China

taxonomicName.emphasis: Lesteva ( s. str. ) cala Ma, Li & Zhao, 2012

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Lesteva ( s. str. ) cala
Ma, Li & Zhao, 2012 : 34
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Mt. Longwang , Anji County , Zhejiang Province , China
.

Type material examined.
Holotype : CHINA :
♂ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov., Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
25.iv.2004
, 950–
1,200 m
, Liang Tang leg.’.
Paratypes : CHINA :
5 ♂♂ , 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype
; 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘Jing-Wen Zhu leg.’; 1 ♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘Jia-Yao Hu leg.’; 1 ♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘Jing Chen leg.’; 2 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘Li-Long Zhu leg.’; 2 ♂♂ , 2 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24. iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing-Wen Zhu leg.’; 2 ♂♂ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jia- Yao Hu leg.’; 3 ♂♂ , 2 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing Chen leg.’; 5 ♂♂ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Xin-Jin Li leg.’; 8 ♂♂ , 4 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300–500 m’; 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Huang & Chi leg.’; 1 ♂ , 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Li-Long Zhu leg.’; 4 ♂♂ , 5 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Li-Long Zhu leg.’; 3 ♂♂ , 2 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing-Wen Zhu leg.’; 2 ♂♂ , 4 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300–500 m’; 1 ♂ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing Chen leg.’; 1♂ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Li & Hu leg’.

Additional material examined (224 exs):
1 ♂ , 4 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Anhui Prov. , Anqing City (安庆市), Qianshan County (潜山县), Mt. Tianzhu (天柱山),
1150–1250 m
,
25.iv.2005
, Hu & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
4 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
300–1200 m
,
23–25.v.2004
, Li, Tang & Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
92 ♂♂ , 116 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
350–1200 m
,
24–26.iv.2006
, He, Li, Ling, Zhu, Shen, Tang, Wang & Yuan leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♂ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山), alt.
1250 m
,
24.v.2009
, Feng, Liu, Yin & Yuan leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
1050–1200 m
,
15.v.2013
, Chen & Pan leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♂ , 1 ♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临安市), Mt. Tianmu (天目山),
800–1150 m
,
19.v.2006
, Hu & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♂ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临安市), Mt. East Tianmu (东天目 山), alt.
650 m
,
25.iv.2008
, Peng & Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
2 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临安市), Mt. Tianmu (天目山), Gaoling (告岭), alt.
800 m
,
26.iv.2008
, He & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
.

Comment. The original description was based on 73 specimens collected from Mt. Longwang, Zhejiang ( Ma, Li & Zhao 2012 ). The above material from Anhui represent new provincial records ( Fig. 34 ). For illustrations of
L. cala
see Figs 2A , 3 E–F, 5A–C and
Ma, Li & Zhao (2012
: figs 1, 3–5).
